members.business_description: EEC is a state-owned enterprise that generates, transmits, and distributes electricity within Eswatini, ensuring reliable energy solutions for businesses and households.

members.business_description: FINCORP provides accessible financial solutions, including loans and investment services, to stimulate entrepreneurship and economic development in Eswatini.

members.name: Eco Plus
members.business_description: Eco Plus focuses on environmental preservation and offers consulting and services to promote sustainable practices in Eswatini.

members.name: Amahle Travel Solutions
members.business_description: Amahle Travel Solutions specializes in travel planning and provides customized packages to help tourists and locals explore Eswatini and beyond.

members.name: Apollo Printers
members.business_description: Apollo Printers offers high-quality printing and media solutions, catering to businesses and individuals with innovative branding and marketing materials.
